page.title: 03Housing Developments
page.content: A long time ago there was a pig yard in Dunston ,but since then it has been changed. It was called the pig yard but now it is Halls Court because it has been built on and the people who live there do not really want to live in the pig yard. Also there are some new houses built on the green they have been there for five years. The green has been changed into a very good playing area for children.Many old ladies come to feed the ducks which live on the green. Along Chapel Lane two houses have been knocked down and two more houses are being built. Most people think that the village should stay as it is.Some people say that the village is too modern and that if people are going to build they ought to use stone.
